text:
Adeline Sacré (born 12 March 1998 in Saint-Jean-d'Angély) is a French water polo player.
She was a member of the France women's national water polo team at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships, and 2017 World Aquatics Championships. and 2016 Women's European Water Polo Championship.

annotations.surface_form: France women's national water polo team
